tasks.label: Test: Validate Dependencies
args: try { Write-Host 'Testing task execution' -ForegroundColor Green; exit 0 } catch { Write-Error $_; exit 1 }

tasks.label: PatchManager: Load Module with Error Handling
args: try { Import-Module '${workspaceFolder}/pwsh/modules/PatchManager/PatchManager.psd1' -Force -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Host 'PatchManager loaded successfully' -ForegroundColor Green } catch { Write-Error 'PatchManager import failed: $_'; Write-Host 'Module path: ${workspaceFolder}/pwsh/modules/PatchManager/' -ForegroundColor Yellow; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Test: Run Pester Tests with Error Handling
args: try { Invoke-Pester -Path './tests/' -Output Detailed -PassThru } catch { Write-Error 'Pester test error: $_'; exit 1 }

tasks.label: PSScriptAnalyzer: Full Analysis with Error Handling
args: try { if (Get-Module -ListAvailable -Name PSScriptAnalyzer) { Invoke-ScriptAnalyzer -Path './pwsh/' -Recurse -Severity Warning,Error -IncludeDefaultRules | Format-Table -AutoSize } else { Write-Error 'PSScriptAnalyzer module not found. Install with: Install-Module PSScriptAnalyzer -Force'; exit 1 } } catch { Write-Error 'PSScriptAnalyzer error: $_'; exit 1 }
